item.description:
One day to go and the weather forecast is perfect! Gather your friends for a great day and evening in Boston! Order your tickets online today to reserve your spot.

There will be no host for this event but do feel free to grab some friends and come into Boston for this fun occasion.  There will be lots of people on the boat to meet!

Tickets can still be ordered online or purchased directly from me.

Thank you.  Amadeus

 

The seventh annual No Alibi cruise tickets can now be ordered online and paid by credit card!

Now better than EVAH!!! The cruise is 3.5 hours this year!

Tickets are $35, $30 if you order today.

http://noalibirocks.com/cruisetix7.htm

This is always a fun event.  We have consistently had about 250 people attending!

Spend the afternoon in Boston, then join us in the evening for live music and dancing on the harbor cruise!  Boat returns at midnight.

Tickets are available online or directly from Mark "Amadeus".
item.name: 7th Annual Boston Harbor Cruise
